channel.title: How to make a shop buy youre items? [pi]
channel.description:
hello moparscape i wanna make my shop buy my items, butit says you cannot sell (at every item) how to enable sell to shop? (i try seeking at google moparscape, only delta items show up:( )
running 317 pi

item.title: How to make a shop buy youre items? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Okay go to shops.cfg, and after the shop name there is numbers either 1 or 2, the first number is the sell and the second one is the buy. Test it out I believe it has to be set to 1 so the shop will buy but Iâ€™m not positive.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop buy youre items? [pi]
